## Array Arithmetic

```{python}
baseline_low = 3.00
lows = make_array(baseline_low - 0.872, 
                  baseline_low - 0.629,
                  baseline_low - 0.126, 
                  baseline_low + 0.728)
lows
```

```{python}
make_array(
    highs.item(0) - lows.item(0),
    highs.item(1) - lows.item(1),
    highs.item(2) - lows.item(2),
    highs.item(3) - lows.item(3)
)
```

```{python}
highs - lows
```

```{python}
(9/5*highs + 32 - (9/5*lows + 32))
```

```{python}
9/5 * (highs - lows)
```
